class.name: hiqp_ros/HiQPJointVelocityController
class.description: The HiQPJointVelocityController generates velocity commands for a set of joints. It expects a VelocityJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: hiqp_ros/HiQPJointVelocityControllerCollision
class.description: The HiQPJointVelocityControllerCollision is a derived class from HiQPJointVelocityController which allows to integrate a collision checker and add tasks for avoiding collisions.
